name: 射日传说 Sun-shot legend
description:
This is a role-playing game.
This work tells the follow-up story of the ancient Chinese myth of shooting the sun. Every nine Yang in the sky, shoot down eight Yang, save the world. The player controls the protagonist to kill monsters to complete the level.


The work tells the follow-up story of the ancient Chinese myth Houyi who shot the sun. The player controls the protagonist to shoot monsters to finish the level. The story is after Yi and Chang 'e's daughter Yi Ru so, after the fall of her parents, and every nine sun in the sky of heaven and earth vision, in order to save the world, adhering to the will of her father, shot down eight SUNS. When shooting the sun god bow Houyi gave his daughter Yi Rusuo, but the arrows of the sun were scattered all over the place, Yi Rusuo in order to shoot the sun, set foot on the journey to find arrows, players need to play the protagonist Yi Rusuo for the task of lowering demons to remove demons to find arrows to shoot the sun, during the encounter demons and ghosts, dangerous. If you want to know what happens next, please go with the young man.
